title: Simulation/VR-Based Online Program for Strengthening Scientific Leadership Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced scientific expertise and managerial experience
context.additional_context: Non-face-to-face long-term education utilizing VR devices and digital learning platforms

learning_goals: Learners perform crisis management processes with over 85% success rates in science-based decision-making simulations
Successfully apply conflict resolution strategies among team members in a VR collaborative environment at least three times.
Prepare decision-making reports with 90% accuracy using scientific data visualization tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
